text: Willis Reed Jr. (June 25, 1942 – March 21, 2023) was an American basketball player, coach and general manager. He spent his entire professional playing career (1964–1974) with the New York Knicks. In 1982, Reed was inducted into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame. In 1996 he was voted one of the "50 Greatest Players in NBA History". ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame inductees Category:National Basketball Association coaches Category:National Basketball Association players with retired numbers Category:New York Knicks players Category:Power forwards Category:Sports executives and administrators Category:Sportspeople from Louisiana
title: Willis Reed
